nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils

Class ChannelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils.ChannelHelper

  • public class ChannelHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for channels in web services
    WARN: Be aware that this helper doesn't access the services through the security layer. They are all local services.
    Author:
    luis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChannelHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel get(java.lang.String channel)
      Returns a channel by internal name, handling empty strings by returning null
      Channel getResolved(java.lang.String internalName)
      Returns a channel by internal name, but when the current request comes from a client restricted to a channel, use that channel.
      java.lang.String resolveChannel(java.lang.String channel)
      When the current request comes from a client restricted to a channel, use that channel.
      PrincipalType resolvePrincipalType(java.lang.String principalType) 
      java.lang.String restricted()
      Returns the channel name for the current client's restricted channel, or null when not restricted
      void setChannelServiceLocal(ChannelServiceLocal channelService)

      • getResolved

        public Channel getResolved(java.lang.String internalName)
        Returns a channel by internal name, but when the current request comes from a client restricted to a channel, use that channel. Otherwise, use the parameter
